usefulItems: long sharp knife, large serving bowl, baking paper
title: Chicken, Pepper and Steamed Vegetable Salad

ingredients.content: 200 g Swiss chard, white, stems removed from base of leaves, torn in half
2 pinches fine sea salt, plus extra to taste
2 pinches ground black pepper, plus extra to taste
500 g mixed peppers, cut in strips (5 mm wide)

preparations.content: Place chard in mixing bowl and chop <b>10 sec/speed 4<b> while stirring with spatula through hole in mixing bowl lid until chard is chopped (2-3 cm). Transfer to a bowl and set aside. Rinse mixing bowl.
Season each chicken breast with 1 pinch salt and 1 pinch pepper then place in Varoma dish and set aside.
Place garlic in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add oil and sauté <b>3 min/Varoma/speed <b>. Meanwhile, add onions and chard to Varoma dish then set aside. Line Varoma tray with baking paper. Transfer sautéed garlic to a small bowl.

Place water in mixing bowl and place Varoma dish into position. Insert prepared Varoma tray then weigh peppers onto it. Drizzle with reserved garlic oil, cover, then steam <b>25-30 min/Varoma/speed 2<b> until chicken is cooked.
Transfer reserved cooked peppers, cooking juices from peppers, cooked onion and chard to a large serving bowl.
Add diced tomatoes, oregano, salt and pepper to taste to serving bowl.
Cut chicken breasts into thin strips and add to serving bowl. Mix well and serve with small spoonfuls of curd cheese placed on top.

hintsAndTricks: Chard can be replaced with other vegetables like courgettes, broccoli or asparagus.
Remove any large pieces of stem from chopped chard in step 1.
Prolong step 1 by 5 seconds if necessary until chard is chopped in 2-3 cm pieces.
